text: 💡🇺🇦 Ukraine's energy sector has come a long way in 10 years, despite Russia's continued threats. 💪🏻 Ukrainian lawmakers have made significant strides in aligning energy legislation with European standards, boosting energy security, and ensuring financial sustainability. 🌟 The journey to transparent energy markets, subsidy-free households, and a state-free sector has been challenging, but Ukraine's resilience and determination are truly inspiring. 💪🏻🇺🇦
